name: SAKURA'S FIGHTS
description:
SAKURA'S FIGHT, KEYBOARD FIGHTING GAME, inspired by Street fighter,  provide great effects for a nice experience of combat in 3D.

BLENDER, MIXAMO and UE4 Was need to make this "masterpiece" from my point of view of indie dev! 

You are Sakura and you are fighting yourselfand show who is the best!!

This fighting game is in 3D made thanks to the powerful game engine UNREAL ENGINE.

First you should put your name as a new challenger in the Main menu.

After that le'ts start!!

Version2.0.0: 

AI has been improved, the arena has been improved with animations added and change in the atmosphere. The widget has been improved (sakura's name added)

CONTROLS:

PUNCH: Num 1

PUNCH 2: Num 4

KICK 1: Num 6

KICK 2: Num 3

BLOCK (parry): SPACE BUTTON

QUIT: ESCAPE

HOPE YOU ENJOY THIS GAME!
